name: ART NOIR
description: You were just a regular hard boiled private detective with a penchant for fine art. That is, until she walked in. She was a wreck, figuratively. Literally she was a person, more specifically the owner of an art gallery. She told you she had just purchased a collection of paintings from a well known artist, but that some of them were fake. Poor thing. She wanted you to use your detective talents to weed out the fakes, and find the real paintings, if there are any...
